data.description: Tests contents of files and directories
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
In developing another module that writes files on the disk, I
    wanted an easy way to see if it was making those files correctly.
    This module uses Text::Diff in a manner similar to
    Test::Differences, but specifically makes it easy to test the
    contents of files. It also tests directories for structure and/or
    content.
